resources.string: Welcome to Pocket DM.\n \n There isn\'t much to do here just yet, but for now you can take full advantage of the feature that was the primary inspiration behind this app: Critical Hit and Fumble Tables. To use these when your characters roll a critical hit or fumble an attack just select the proper tables from the main menu, enter your percentile roll, then select the weapon being used or press "Go". The result of your roll will appear below.
